items.name: The Letter Wikia
items.title: The Letter Wikia
items.headline: Welcome to The Letter Wikia!
items.desc: The Letter is an interactive horror visual novel currently under developement by Yangyang Mobile. This wikia is a collaborative resource for the game and is maintained by the contributions of the fans. Feel free to use our forums or chat room to discuss gameplay. All editors are welcome. Come join our community!
